message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling this product to you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less.  How about $85?
I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $92.50, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still hoping for a price closer to $85.  I'm willing to offer $87.50.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $92.50. I'm willing to make one more concession to you, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll meet you at $90.50. This is my final offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.
